name: Butcher's Nightmares
description:
Butcher's Nightmares is a dark-looking strategy game with action elements.

You play as a Butcher who has been kidnapped by a Nightmare Lord and trapped in a mysterious world. He must lead his sausage army and fight for his life if he ever hopes to escape and find his way back home.

Enter a strange and croocked world full of meat, candy, and other lost souls like you. Gather resources to raise your army and lead them to the Nightmare Lord who has trapped you here.

  • Mix of 2 genres: light strategy and hack n' slash action
  • Dark atmosphere
  • 2 armies fighting each other: Meat VS Candy
  • Mysterious world
  • 13 levels full of sausages and ice cream
  • No text (that's for you textless lovers <3)

Release date: OCTOBER 2nd
